profile:
A Glass Act has been providing window cleaning, Gutter cleaning, Gutter repairs, interior Painting, exterior Painting, drywall repairs, chandelier cleaning, pressure washing, power washing, house washing, building cleaning exterior, roof cleaning, roof de-mossing, roof moss control treatments, concrete & Paving stone sealing, post construction cleaning, pre-occupany cleaning and a variety of other building maintenance services in the Vancouver area since 1988. 

****

We are pleased to announce that effective July 1, 2015, all of our cleaning services are now available to residents and business' in the Victoria & the Saanich Peninsula area! 

****

COVID-19 STATEMENT

COVID-19 has been declared a pandemic. Federal, provincial and local governments and their agencies have been announcing daily recommendations and restrictions that affect the everyday lives of every Canadian.

Whereas the health authorities are still stating that the risk of contracting the virus is low to moderate in BC, the health and safety of our staff and customers is a paramount concern for us at A Glass Act Window Cleaners & Building Maintenance.

We would ask that customers postpone in booking any INTERIOR CLEANING appointments with us until such time that the major Canadian health authorities announce that it will be safer for us to be working indoors (in your homes) in a more contained proximity to our customers.  We will continue to provide our EXTERIOR CLEANING services at this time while following the very important social distancing regulations.

In addition, we are requiring our staff to self-isolate if they become ill or if someone in their household becomes ill.  We do look forward to providing you with our exterior Spring cleaning service, to get your home or business looking refreshed and clean for the season.  We know that many of you will be spending more time in your yards, gardens and patios this Spring while staying at home.  We look forward to making your building exteriors cleaner and brighter while we all stay safer and healthy at home!!

Thank you for your understanding and support.

Kirby Koochin
(President)
A Glass Act Window Cleaners and Building Maintenance Ltd.

profile:
Right now we are offering 10% Off with Promo Code "Homefeb10" Quick Sidekick is dedicated to providing services to you Quick and efficiently while providing you with the great customer service that you deserve.
Our experienced staff can provide a wide array of services that will help maintain and improve your residential and commercial properties.
No matter which of our great services you choose, you can be sure that you’ll receive the best service. 

We understand that every home has a project and every project has a budget. That's why we offer a wide range of home improvement solutions, no matter their budget. Our team of professionals works with each client to create a custom solution to fit their needs.


Professional technicians that have Work Safe and liability insurance. 

Serving residential properties, townhouses, Condos, Apartments, and commercial properties

Our services are:

-Gutter Cleaning - Maintaining your gutters properly is one of the most important things you can do to sustain your home’s value and beauty.
-Gutter Repairs - We provide complete gutter repair services, including leaks, broken sections, and downspouts. Our experts will ensure that your gutters are working correctly and keeping your home protected from water damage.
-Pressure Washing - Pressure washing is one of the most affordable and simplest ways to increase your business or homes value and a good way to prevent cost, time, and trouble of future repairs.
-Roof Cleaning - After our roof cleaning service, you’ll have instant curb appeal that can shave years from your home. But you’re also getting shingles of superior quality. They’ll last longer and serve you better…Which means that you don’t have to accrue expenses for repairs and replacements. Our results speak for themselves.
-Snow Removal - Fast and reliable shoveling and salting snow removal
-Painting 
Interior Painting- Specialize and take pride in quality interior painting. 
Exterior Painting - Every house, grand or humble, deserves quality exterior house painting services.
Commercial Painting- Maintaining a commercial structure is like maintaining a career hard work counts. Our company radiates a sense of hard work
Residential Painting - Quality residential house interior painting is a very complex task. Full attention to details is necessary to get the job well done.
-Handyman Services -When your building needs basic repairs, it’s good to know someone you trust is nearby to lend a hand. We have servicemen on call to help you out at any time.


Quick Sidekick is made of a team that is old fashion hard working people. 

Serving Vancouver, Richmond, Burnaby, New Westminster, Coquitlam, Delta, Surrey, South Surrey, White Rock, North Vancouver, West Vancouver

profile:
Martinez Property Services is dedicated to make home owners proud of their property by delivering quality work.

Our safety conscious technicians are trained to take good care of your property and give you a peace of mind.

 
Your property is something that you should be able to take real pride in. However, that can be hard when things are unclean and generally not well maintained.

Property maintenance Surrey BC can take a real time commitment, and we know that’s not always something that you can do. As a result, it’s often not long before certain parts of your property start to look a little worse for wear.

With our professional range of property services, you can make sure that everything gets done around your property. We offer a service that can take care of all cleaning and work that any property requires, whether it’s a residential or commercial one.

So, don’t let things get out of hand because you don’t have time. Our service is here to take care of it all for you and make sure that your property is well maintained and effectively looked after.

 

With our service, looking after your property is so much easier. As part of our service, we can do all the general work and maintenance that all properties require.

Our team can help clean out your gutters, clean your roof and even your windows. Along with this, we also offered a selection of more specialised services, which includes pressure washing, moss removal and treatment services, as well as high rise window cleaning.

The services that we provide are available for both residential and commercial properties. So, make sure that everything gets done with our easy to organise and affordable service.

profile:
Why Choose Us
Vancouver is a great city to explore and experience. Imagine coming home to a freshly made bed, sparkling clean kitchen and bathroom, and meticulously swept and mopped floors. Our Parsu Clean Specialists are happy to do the hard work. However you like to spend your time, you’ll enjoy coming home to a squeaky clean environment.
GONE GREEN?
Let us know if you prefer green cleaning supplies.
TRUST US
Our team members undergo strict background checks and are thoroughly screened.
TRUSTED TEAM
Steady rains the leaves are dropping and each week our and hauling them off the properties..
YOUR SATISFACTION IS GUARANTEED
If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll re-clean for free.
SECURE PAYMENT
Once the cleaning is complete, your payment is made securely online.
IT'S THAT EASY
Select the number of bedrooms, pick your date & time, and Parsu Cleaning will be there for you!

profile:
Our professional and friendly team provides top quality window cleaning, gutter cleaning, and pressure washing services for your home, strata, or commercial building. We are always happy to give you a fixed quote and answer any questions that you may have before we start, and our workers are fully trained, and have taken safety courses to ensure that all work is preformed to high standards and in the safest way.

You can be confident that your house or property is being cared for by the best in the business. 

Some of our popular services include:
Gutter / Evestrough cleaning, window cleaning, power washing, parkade cleaning, window washing by water-fed-pole, gutter cleaned by gutter-vac, roof moss cleaning, moss treatments and spraying, siding washing, high rise window washing, parkade power washing.
products: We use eco friendly cleaning products and are always careful around your flowers plants and property
services: gutter cleaning, power washing, high pressure washing, window washing, gutter exterior washing, roof de-mossing, moss spraying & removal, high rise window cleaning, water fed pole window washing, algae washing parkade power washing
specialities: Moss removal for roofs and brick. We use special products developed for killing moss and that prevent it from coming back.
diplomas: SPRAT, IRATA, Fall Protection, Boom and Scissor lift
name: City View Systems Inc.
